LABELS.DisclaimerText: This calculator is intended to be used only for the purpose of assessing and demonstrating potential cost savings ranges under normalized hospital cost conditions. The results and outcomes are estimations only and should not be interpreted as a guarantee or warranty of similar results. It does not suggest a definitive review of actual costs and savings incurred in a hospital. Savings are estimates only and specific to the individual case. Savings may not be typical and may vary.

REFERENCES.2: (2) Ruiz C, Díaz MÁ, Zapata JM, Bravo S, Panay S, Escobar C, Godoy J, Andresen M, Castro R. Características y evolución de los pacientes que ingresan a una Unidad de Cuidados Intensivos de un hospital público [Characteristics and evolution of patients admitted to a public hospital intensive care unit]. Rev Med Chil. 2016 Oct;144(10):1297-1304. Spanish. doi: 10.4067/S0034-98872016001000009. PMID: 28074985.
REFERENCES.3: (3) 2014 costs: USD 68.83 exchanged into Chilean pesos; Medina, Alex & Gallegos-Muñoz, Cecilia & Pavez, Carolina & Morales, Berta. (2015). Costo día cama servicio pensionado para una enfermedad en un hospital de Chile. Revista de la Universidad Industrial de Santander. Salud. 47. 301-312. 10.18273/revsal.v47n3-2015006.
REFERENCES.4: (4) 2013 costs: $406,292; Alvear, Sandra, Jorge Canteros, Juan Carlos Vintimilla Jara and Patricia Rodríguez. “Costos reales de tratamientos intensivos por paciente y día cama.” Revista Medica De Chile 141 (2013): 202-208.
